review_title: Fantastic organization where employees actually care

review_title: Involved in something that makes a different in others life

review_title: Happy to have crossed path with Amidacare
job_title: Data Programmer in New York, NY
pros:
I am glad to have crossed paths with Amidacare.   Took a job, thought to use my G-d given talent to help people, met lots of great people and the experience has opened doors for me. 

Amidacare has a pretty unique corporate culture, different from many Fortune 500 companies I had worked for before.   Working there is more personal and friendlier compared to Fortune 500 companies.    Just good people, trying to help others.

Management is very good people, Alexandra, John, Lorain.   CEO has his hart in the right place.

Compensation is competitive, great benefits.  (This is a none-profit, healthcare insurance industry)       

Opportunity to grow your career while helping others seems like a win no matter how you dice it.
cons: Amidacare is going though some growth so there are some growing pains.

job_title: Anonymous Employee in New York, NY
pros: The company's mission is great and the majority of the people here are hard working individuals.
cons: Upper Management seems to be all over the place. For some time there were about 12 VPs and it seemed like the company was divided.  Not many opportunities for growth. The opportunities you get are based off of who you know or favoritism.

review_title: Not a good place for professional, but OK to start up
job_title: Professional in New York, NY
pros: Location. Reasonable working hours.  Vacation + Seek days benefits provided.
cons: The culture is to political.  High turn over rate ...... average employee stay there less then a year.

job_title: Behavioral Health Specialist in New York, NY
pros: Working at Amidacare builds your compassion for people.  It allows you to work with different diversity of people to understand and related to their way of living.
cons: Working at Amidacare breaks you down, you believe you are strong emotionally, until you hear a members story.

job_title: Member Service Assistant in New York, NY
pros: I loved working with many people, the company really strives to provide adequate health insurance to its members.
cons: Unfortunately, some managers and team leaders are hindering the company. those two-three people in management are caddy, break human resources laws, and bully many employees with their jobs.

review_title: Nice company but management needed improvment
job_title: Care Coordinator in New York, NY
pros: Wonderful company mission, good opportunities, room to grow or advance to different positions, centrally located in New York City
cons: Upper management needs guidance, breaks and lunch time is a joke, supervisors need to give the younger employees the opportunity to participate.

review_title: Amida Care truly goes over and beyond the call of duty

review_title: Great pay, not-so-great environment & lack of clarity
